TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WizardStepCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class WizardStepCollection Implements IList
public ref class WizardStepCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type WizardStepCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示控件中用作向导的 派生类的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of -derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理一系列-派生的对象中的控件，它就像一个向导，如控件或控件。The class is used to store and manage a collection of -derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard, such as the control or the control. 例如，控件使用类的其属性。For example, the control uses the class for its property. 有很多方法可以访问的派生的对象中的:There are multiple ways you can access the -derived objects in the : - 使用属性来直接访问-派生对象特定的从零开始索引处。Use the property to directly access a -derived object at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法来创建可用于循环访问集合的枚举器。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法将复制的内容集合转换为对象。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何填充集合使用声明性语法。The following example demonstrates how to populate the collection using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare/CS/wizardstepcollectiondeclarecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare/VB/wizardstepcollectiondeclarevb.aspx#3)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式填充集合。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically populate a collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/CS/wizardstepcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/VB/wizardstepcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 下面是在前面的示例网页的代码隐藏文件。The following is the code-behind file for the Web page in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/CS/wizardstepcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/VB/wizardstepcollection.vb#2)]

span.span: Copies all the items from a collection to a compatible one-dimensional array of objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将集合的内容复制到指定的从零开始数组。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array. 目标数组的指定索引处开始复制项。Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array. 将项放入数组后，你可以使用数组语法访问中的项集合。After the items are in an array, you can use array syntax to access the items in the collection. 或者，还可以使用方法来创建可用于访问集合中的项的枚举器。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法复制对象从集合到一个数组。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the objects from the collection to an array. 然后循环访问数组以显示每个属性-派生的对象。The array is then iterated through to display the property of each -derived object. 请注意，在此示例中，的属性控件是实例类。Note that in the example, the property of the control is an instance of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo/CS/wizardstepcollectioncopytocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo/VB/wizardstepcollectioncopytovb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets the object at the specified index in the collection.
The object to be retrieved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用以下语法，此属性提供访问集合中特定元素的能力：myCollection[index]。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: myCollection[index].

related.span: 向导 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Wizard Web Server Control
